name: The Web Design Company
tagline: WordPress web design and SEO Consultants
description: The Web Design Company is a professional Internet Consulting and Web Design agency. They specialize in best-in-class Website Design, Online Marketing, Corporate Identity and Print Graphics. Their Genesis based popular WordPress theme design has to offer lot more than any other regular CMS, It searches engine friendly architecture will help to rank your local business in Google much easier.
